ROOT.Substation: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s LEFT Join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID={0}
ROOT.Plant: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.plant_type as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s LEFT join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID={0}
ROOT.Converstation: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s LEFT join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID={0}
ROOT.Station: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.plant_type as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID={0}
ROOT.AcLine: SELECT l.ID,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,l.DISPATCH_ORG_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B l join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on l.VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where id={0}
ROOT.DcLine: SELECT l.ID,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,l.DISPATCH_ORG_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B l join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on l.VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where id={0}
ROOT.Line: SELECT l.ID,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,l.DISPATCH_ORG_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B l join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on l.VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where id={0} UNION SELECT l.ID,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,l.DISPATCH_ORG_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B l join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on l.VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where id={0}
ROOT.StationsLocation: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s WHERE ID IN ({0}) UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s WHERE ID IN ({0}) UNION ALL SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s WHERE ID IN ({0})
ROOT.Tower: SELECT l.ID,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,l.DISPATCH_ORG_ID FROM SG_DEV_TOWER_B t JOIN SG_DEV_DCLINE_R_TOWER r ON t.ID=r.TOWER_ID JOIN SG_DEV_DCLINE_B l ON r.LINE_ID=l.ID JOIN SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on l.VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where t.ID={0} UNION ALL SELECT l.ID,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,l.DISPATCH_ORG_ID FROM SG_DEV_TOWER_B t JOIN SG_DEV_ACLINE_R_TOWER r ON t.ID=r.TOWER_ID JOIN SG_DEV_ACLINE_B l ON r.LINE_ID=l.ID JOIN SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on l.VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where t.ID={0}
